post.body: Can i use hashtag # to find something that i'm interesting in there?
Is is possible to run ZeroNet oc Android or IOS mobile phones?

i think i have some idea - how ZeroNet can be usefull for peoples, it is great for pear-to-pear search. To establish new links with others for cooperations and commercial )  it is a kind of Uber but without need to pay a commission ))

comment.body: So idea is simple: for advertising we should use this zeronet space, and for contact information we can leave here some regular channels )
